entities.name: Divination
entities.description: Divination is a subject being studied by Hermione, and she's not sure if she'll continue studying it because of the lesson on tea leaves.

entities.name: Arithmancy
entities.description: Arithmancy is a class that Hermione enjoys more than Divination.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who's studying Divination and Arithmancy.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is Hermione's friend and classmate.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is Ron's friend and classmate.

entities.name: Malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a Slytherin student who's also in the Care of Magical Creatures class with Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: Slytherins
entities.description: The Slytherins are a group of students from Slytherin house that include Malfoy.

relationships.description: Hermione enjoys Arithmancy more than Divination.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione are classmates in the Care of Magical Creatures class.
Malfoy is a member of Slytherin house.
